title: Des Enfants Gates = Spoiled Children
description: A famous director, unable to concentrate on his new script at home with his family, rents a flat in a high rise building. Instead of finding peace and quiet, he gets involved in the tenants' fight against an exploitative landlord, and with a girl half his age.  Credits: Producers, Alain Sarde, Michel Piccoli, Bertrand Tavernier ; director, Bertrand Tavernier ; writers, Christine Pascal, Charlotte Dubreuil, Bertrand Tavernier ; photography, Alain Levent ; music, Philippe Sarde. Cast: Michel Piccoli, Christine Pascal, Michel Aumont, Gerard Jugnot, Arlette Bonnard, Genevieve Mnich, Thierry Lhermitte, Michel Blanc, Daniel Toscan du Plantier, Martin Lamotte.
